page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN TARBERT,HARRIS
page.content: Compared to the rest of the country the rate of employment is quite high. Over 10% of people are self-employed e.g weaving,pottery,crofting.Although a lot of people are crofters,they usually have another job and have crofting as a hobby.A lot of people are employed in roadworks,public services,shops,working in the hotel and garage services.Many women are also employed in Harris House or looking after the elderly.Although there isn't much fishing as an industry here,some people work on the Hebridies,as cooks,engineers etc. Tourism boosts employment because hotels might be busier,more bus- drivers might be needed .Many people are employed seasonally because of tourism e.g. working on the boat ,more bus-drivers and shop assistants in the summer.
